title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication System
summary: Develop and implement a secure multi-factor authentication (MFA) system for customer login.
description: Build a multi-factor authentication (MFA) feature that requires users to verify their identity using multiple factors such as passwords, one-time passcodes (OTPs), or biometric methods. The system should comply with banking and data security regulations, incorporate encrypted credential storage, and include security measures like session timeouts, failed attempt lockouts, and device recognition to prevent unauthorized access.

title: Personalized Customer Dashboard
summary: Create an intuitive, personalized dashboard to display user-specific banking products and information.
description: Design a dashboard that dynamically presents information and products based on customer profiles and eligibility. The dashboard should display account summaries, balances, offers, and alerts in real time, drawing data from integrated systems. Its modular design must allow customers to customize layouts, ensuring it serves as the main navigation point for accessing various self-service functionalities in the portal.

title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface Design
summary: Ensure the portal provides a consistent and responsive user experience across devices.
description: Develop a responsive design using adaptive UI frameworks to support usage across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. The interface must comply with accessibility guidelines (e.g., WCAG 2.1) and support keyboard navigation, screen readers, and high-contrast modes. Optimize load times and interactions to ensure fluid transitions, maintaining usability consistency regardless of device type or screen resolution.

title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Implement digital workflows for account openings and service modifications that minimize customer effort.
description: Design guided workflows that allow customers to submit new account applications and modify existing services directly from the portal. Integrate automated KYC and AML verification, ensuring alignment with banking regulations. Each workflow must be simple, step-driven, and include real-time validation. Customers should be able to track their progress and receive immediate confirmation at each step of the process.

title: Save and Resume Application Capability
summary: Provide functionality for customers to save incomplete applications and resume later.
description: Enable customers to save ongoing applications securely and resume them later from any device. Implement data encryption for in-progress saves and ensure auto-save mechanisms trigger at key intervals. Customers should be notified of saved drafts and prompted upon re-login to continue where they left off, resulting in improved user convenience and data consistency across devices.

title: Document Upload and Verification Module
summary: Integrate a secure document upload system for customer applications and service requests.
description: Develop a document management component that allows users to upload identification or relevant documents during workflows. This module should support file validation (type and size limits), virus scanning, and metadata tracking. Ensure secure, encrypted storage of uploaded documentation and allow both customers and authorized staff to view document statuses, verifications, and submission confirmations.

title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notifications System
summary: Enable real-time tracking of customer requests and automate notification delivery.
description: Create an event-driven system to keep customers informed of the progress of their account or service requests. Display real-time status updates within the dashboard and automate email or SMS notifications for important events such as submission, review, or approval. Allow customers to manage their notification preferences while ensuring reliable message delivery using secure communication protocols.

title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Auditing
summary: Maintain a detailed and secure history of all customer interactions with the portal.
description: Develop a transaction and interaction logging system that captures every significant customer action, including login attempts, requests, uploads, and updates. Store logs in a tamper-proof, encrypted format for compliance and auditing. Provide customers with access to their activity history while enabling administrators to review reports for operational transparency and regulatory adherence.

title: Core Banking System Integration Layer
summary: Establish secure integration between the portal and the bankâ€™s core systems.
description: Develop an API or middleware layer that ensures seamless communication between the portal and the core banking system. Synchronize customer data, product eligibility, balances, and service requests in real time. Implement error handling, queuing, and retry mechanisms to prevent data loss. Optimize for performance and reliability through monitoring, versioning, and API governance standards.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) Implementation
summary: Implement a role-based access control mechanism to manage permissions and service access.
description: Develop and configure a role-based access architecture for customers, auditors, and administrators. Roles must define access levels to services, data, and functionalities. Implement access policies at both UI and API levels with centralized management for permissions. Ensure compliance with security principles of least privilege, while providing flexibility for future role adjustments and audits.

title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Design a standalone portal database architecture optimized for performance and security.
description: Create a robust database layer specifically for portal transactions, separate from the core banking system to enhance performance and resilience. Implement encryption, indexing, caching, and data partitioning techniques to support high availability. Ensure the database supports real-time synchronization of requests, logging, and session data while adhering to data retention and regulatory policies.
